title: Refund refund tokens if you re-buy the thing you initially refunded?
body: I'm pretty sure i refunded vayne 3 times(at least twice), and yes, i own her again.

replies.body: I would second this, on the condition it only applied if the same currency was used to "re-purchase" the "item" (so if you initially used IP you'd have to use IP to get the refund token back, the same would apply to RP purchases).

That sounds like a better plan, otherwise people would buy champs with rp, then when they have enough ip refund then rebuy that champ with ip.

But who knows if i'm being sincere its April fools after all.

Refund Tokens are meant to be used as a last resort for accidental purchases. Riot has a 'no refund' policy, and the Refund Tokens were an addition that allowed players to get around that, but weren't and aren't a core feature within the store. 

You can read more about this on the Content Refund FAQ: 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ
